name: School Daze - Wake up

This movie is great inspiration for Black Greeks with the same theme as Dazed and Confused and Animal House. Printed on Tultex white unisex tees with black and red ink. name: Black and Gold: Invictus t-shirt
description: LIMITED EDITION ONLY 106 WILL BE SOLD Alpha Phi Alpha :: Invictus t-shirt Out of the Night that covers me Black as the pit from pole to pole... Those few lines of the great poem by William Ernest Henley has inspired and motivated thousands of Alpha Brothers. Show your love for Alpha by wearing your Invictus t-shirts at your next regional or national convention. Make the other brothers jealous with your limited edition apparel from Discreetly Greek. name: Ivy leaf Crocheted Beverage Cozy
description: Alpha Kappa Alpha inspired Coffee Cozy! All are hand stitched and crocheted by the awesome creators of Portland Oregon's own "The Cozy Project" Great gift for any AKA or business woman on the go! These coffee cozies are a perfect fit for the average disposable paper coffee cups. They also look great wrapped around a mug. These will keep your hot drink hot and prevent fingers from getting too toasty! These also may fit a can, beer bottle, or pint glass. Cozies help prevent condensation puddles when used on cold cups.
